topics.body:
Okay...

Creepy shit has been happening with my electronics in my house.
There was a flicker in the light earlier today according to my mom, for what looked like a power surge of some kind. For some reason, her radio which was on a Mandarin speaking frequency, changed itself to another station. And their computer, for the second time, turned itself off without warning. No error, no nothing, and my brother who is a hardware literate person said there was no problem. 
My computer  I believe, has also been acting up.
Strange...

Just a couple days before, my phone wouldn't boot up, and instead made a screech sound before I manage to shut it down and reboot it normally.

Is my house haunted?
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc

I'm sure there's an explanation
I'm not sure if there's an explanation that doesn't involve crazy pseudoscience Though
